business.headline: Asian markets plunge as Trump tariffs spark global sell-off; Nikkei dives nearly 8%Asian markets tumbled sharply following Wall Street's crash, triggered by Trump's tariff escalation and Beijing's retaliation. Japan's Nikkei led the losses, diving nearly 8%, as recession fears gripped investors.

Asian markets suffer huge plunge as Trump's tariffs make Wall Street bleedFutures markets moved swiftly to price in almost five-quarter-point cuts in US rates this year, pulling Treasury yields down sharply and hampering the dollar.

'Black Monday': US expert warns Trump tariffs could trigger worst crash since 1987Jim Cramer warned that markets might face a bloodbath similar to 1987 - when the Dow Jones suffered its biggest single-day crash to date. He claimed that if the US President didn't 'reach out' to nations which have not imposed retaliatory tariffs and reward them for their compliance, the situation could worsen.

Piyush Goyal announces helpline for startups days after 'dukandari' jibe at themDays after questioning the innovation of Indian startups overtly focussing on food delivery and betting and fantasy sports apps, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal announced a helpline for startups if they wanted to make suggestions or file complaints.

How China-US trade war unfolded: A timeline of tariffs and countermovesChina is responding forcefully to Trump's latest tariffs with a 34% tax on US imports, rare earth export curbs, company bans, and WTO action, raising fears of another full-blown trade war.

Jaguar Land Rover to suspend shipments to US over tariffs on BritainJaguar Land Rover, which is owned by India's Tata Motors, confirmed the temporary export suspension after the Times newspaper reported the plan.

JP Morgan warns of 60% chance of global recession after Trump's tariffsFollowing the US-China trade war, global investment firm J.P. Morgan said it now sees a 60% chance of the global economy entering recession by year-end, up from 40% previously.

Wall Street shatters as Trump tariffs trigger worst day in US markets since 2020US markets suffered their steepest decline since 2020 after China retaliated against Trump's tariffs. The S&P 500 fell 6%, fuelling recession fears and intensifying investor anxiety across global markets.

Dow crashes 2,000 points as Trump's tariffs spark global market panicGlobal markets plunged as Trump's tariffs triggered a trade war escalation with China. The Dow fell over 2,000 points, crude prices tumbled, and investors feared an impending global recession.

Higher inflation, slower growth: US Federal Reserve chair warns after Trump tariffsUS Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell spoke as global markets continued a swoon that has wiped some 10 per cent off major US stock indexes since Trump announced a raft of new tariffs on Wednesday.

US stocks plummet after China's retaliatory levies in response to Trump tariffsNasdaq IXIC dropped more than 20 per cent from its all-time closing high touched in December, putting it on course to confirm a bear market.
Income tax return 2025: ITR-2 filing now made easierITR-2 is meant for individuals whose annual income is above Rs 50 lakh or who earn from sources like rent, capital gains, or other sources.

entertainment.headline: Ajith Kumar's huge cut-out collapses causing panic among fans. Viral VideoA towering banner of Ajith Kumar collapsed at a Tirunelveli theatre in Tamil Nadu on April 6. A video of fans fleeing from the theatre has now emerged on social media.

Kolkata's Manasi Ghosh wins Indian Idol 15, takes home Rs 25 lakhThe winner of Indian Idol 15 is Manasi Ghosh from Kolkata. She not only won the trophy but also took home a brand-new car along with prize money of Rs 25 lakh.

Jujutsu Kaisen on Indian television: When, where to watch the anime on TVJujutsu Kaisen is set to premiere on Indian television, airing weekdays at 9:00 pm
 IST on Sony YAY! with Hindi and Tamil dubs. This marks its TV debut in India.

Sikandar no more? Chhaava had more occupancy on Day 51 than Salman Khan filmChhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal, surpassed Salman Khan's much-anticipated Eid release Sikandar in occupancy, drawing more footfall even on Day 51. This surprising turn of events highlights Chhaava's ongoing success as Sikandar struggles to gain traction despite its initial hype.

Fountain of Youth trailer: John Kransinski, Natalie Portman search for immortalityThe trailer of Guy Ritchie's upcoming film, Fountain of Youth, released recently. Starring John Krasinski and Natalie Portman, the film is a thrilling heist adventure.

Watch: Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone reunite on-screen after Dua's birthOne of Bollywood's favourite couple, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh, delighted fans with a recent appearance, marking their first on-screen collaboration since welcoming their daughter, Dua.

Jack Black's A Minecraft Movie becomes a smash hit, revives Hollywood box officeJack Black's latest venture, A Minecraft Movie, has taken the global box office by storm. The film's success is a beacon of hope for Hollywood, showcasing the appeal of video game adaptations.

Peddi 1st glimpse: Ram Charan hits it out of the stadium in Buchi Babu Sana's filmOn the occasion of Ram Navami, the teaser for 'Peddi' starring Ram Charan was released, showcasing his striking new look. The film is set to hit theatres on March 27, 2026.

Parth Samthaan to join CID as new ACP after Shivaji Satam's exitParth Samthaan is set to be the next ACP in CID. He will be replacing Shivaji Satam, whose character ACP Pradyuman, was killed on the show.

Jacqueline Fernandez's mother dies due to health complicationsJacqueline Fernandez is grieving the loss of her mother, who died after being hospitalised in Mumbai. The actor and her family will release a statement soon.

Shivaji Satam aka ACP Pradyuman had 'no clue' about his track being over in CIDShivaji Satam, who plays ACP Pradyuman on CID, spoke about his character's death on the show, stating he was not informed of the end of his track and is currently on a break.

Tron Ares trailer: Jared Leto unleashes digital chaos as he enters the real worldTron Ares, the third instalment in the iconic sci-fi series, releases its trailer, showcasing a thrilling chase and digital mayhem. Jared Leto stars as Ares, a program crossing into the real world, with a stellar cast alongside him.

Akshaye Khanna set to make Telugu debut after Chhaava successAkshaye Khanna has been confirmed to join the cast of Mahakali, the next film in the Prasanth Varma Cinematic Universe. This will also mark the actor's Telugu debut.

Diljit Dosanjh, Will Smith groove to dhol beats. Fans call it ultimate collabDiljit Dosanjh surprised fans with a viral Instagram video featuring Will Smith. The duo was seen enjoying a vibrant Bhangra dance, sparking excitement online.

Hugh Grant criticises Heathrow officer for 'creepy' questions with his children. Fans reactActor Hugh Grant expressed his discontent on social media after a Heathrow immigration officer's comments to his children. The incident has divided opinions online, with many defending the officer's actions.

Miss Mary: The Meena Kumari-Kishore Kumar classic that captured age of innocenceIn this week's Retro Review, we revisit 'Miss Mary', starring Meena Kumari, Gemini Ganesan and Kishore Kumar. Perhaps one of India's most remade films, the comedy movie still remains a classic six decades later.

Sidharth Malhotra, Saif Ali Khan in talks for Race 4: Producer Ramesh TauraniProducer Ramesh Taurani clarified the casting rumors surrounding Race 4. He mentioned that only Saif Ali Khan and Sidharth Malhotra are currently in talks for the film.

Top 10 teen shows to watch on Netflix in April 2025Netflix's April 2025 lineup features ten top-rated teen shows, blending romance, drama, comedy, and fantasy. Highlights include Heartstopper, Stranger Things, Never Have I Ever, and Teenage Bounty Hunters.

Burqa City director 'surprised' by similarity with Laapataa Ladies' plotFrench director Fabrice Bracq accused Kiran Rao's Laapataa Ladies of plagiarising his short film Burqa City. The controversy has sparked a debate on originality and creative influence.

general news.headline: Trump prescribes dose of painful 'medicine' as tariffs pummel global marketsAmid falling global markets due to his announcement of reciprocal tariffs,  US President Donald Trump said that "sometimes you have to take medicine to fix something".

1 killed, 6 injured after 'drunk' TV director's car rams crowd in Kolkata marketFollowing the incident, both people in the car were stopped by locals and beaten by the agitated crowd before being handed over to the police. As officers rushed to the spot to rescue them, an official told India Today TV that the co-passenger, Shriya Basu, appeared to be intoxicated and collapsed on the road.

Asian markets suffer huge plunge as Trump's tariffs make Wall Street bleedFutures markets moved swiftly to price in almost five-quarter-point cuts in US rates this year, pulling Treasury yields down sharply and hampering the dollar.

Forest department driver seen offering water to Kuno cheetahs fired: SourcesThe forest department had earlier issued an advisory to local villagers to maintain a distance from Jwala and her cubs, who were seen roaming beyond the core forest area, and not to offer them any food.

Mr Piyush Goyal, this is how startups struggle to survive in IndiaAfter Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal slammed Indian startups for the lack of innovation and a narrow focus on just e-commerce, a startup founder discussed, in a post on X, how difficult it was to do business in India. Murtaza Amin, who runs an IT services company, BizProspex, from Burhanpur in Madhya Pradesh, revealed the challenges faced by startups in India.

BJP claims Hindus attacked at Ram Navami procession in Kolkata, cops reactThe BJP alleged targeted attacks on Hindus in Kolkata and blamed the Trinamool Congress, while police denied that any Ram Navami procession had taken place in the area.

Ask first-year economics student: P Chidambaram jabs PM on Tamil Nadu fundsCongress leader P Chidambaram dismissed Prime Minister Narendra Modi's claims of increased central fund allocations to Tamil Nadu as misleading, arguing that such annual increases are routine.

Groom gives Rs 5,000 instead of Rs 50,000 for shoes, thrashed by bride's familyA groom was beaten up by the bride's family during an argument after he gave Rs 5,000 instead of Rs 50,000 to the bride's sister-in-law in UP's Bijnor. The bride's family called him a beggar, which led to an argument, and subsequently a fight.

Inside Siraj's IPL renaissance: India snub heartbreak, reverse swing masteryMohammed Siraj's career has been a roller-coaster ride in the past few months, with the fast bowler facing several heartbreaks. However, the speedster has arrived at the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) having learnt his lessons and is putting a show for the ages at the T20 extravaganza.

University of Bath School of Management: A Pathway to Global Career SuccessBath's School of Management blends top academics, hands-on learning, and career support to help students secure jobs at leading global companies.

Acid attack on Bihar BJP leader's daughter, Tejashwi Yadav blames state governmentUnidentified individuals threw acid on the 24-year-old daughter of BJP leader in Bihar's Begusarai while she was asleep at her home.

'Baby you didn't come...': Inconsolable fiancée of IAF pilot who died in crashFlight Lieutenant Siddharth Yadav was cremated with full military honours in his village after dying in a Jaguar crash. His family and fiancée Saniya mourned him. His parents said they were proud of his bravery and sacrifice.

Ajith Kumar's huge cut-out collapses causing panic among fans. Viral VideoA towering banner of Ajith Kumar collapsed at a Tirunelveli theatre in Tamil Nadu on April 6. A video of fans fleeing from the theatre has now emerged on social media.

Men wave saffron flags atop Prayagraj dargah gate on Ram Navami, removed by copsA group of men waved saffron flags outside a dargah in Prayagraj with some of them climbing atop its gate and chanting slogans. Police removed them from the spot and said legal action was being taken in the matter.

Sangh Parivar proclaiming itself as censor board: Pinarayi Vijayan on Empuraan rowKerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan alleged that the "Sangh Parivar" was proclaiming itself as a censor board amid a row over some of its sequences in the L2: Empuraan film, which appeared to depict the 2002 Gujarat riots.

Hamas fires rockets at Israeli cities, 1 injured, evacuation order issued in GazaHamas fired a barrage of rockets at cities in southern Israel, injuring one person. The Israeli military issued an evacuation order, asking residents of several districts in Deir Al-Balah in central Gaza to leave their areas, citing earlier rocket firing.

Kolkata's Manasi Ghosh wins Indian Idol 15, takes home Rs 25 lakhThe winner of Indian Idol 15 is Manasi Ghosh from Kolkata. She not only won the trophy but also took home a brand-new car along with prize money of Rs 25 lakh.
Question Time: Weekly News QuizThink you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

Le Pen supporters rally in Paris after conviction, accuse courts of political biasMarine Le Pen's conviction and ban from office sparked a massive rally in Paris. Her supporters, led by Jordan Bardella, framed it as a political attack, echoing populist, Trump-style rhetoric.

Sikandar no more? Chhaava had more occupancy on Day 51 than Salman Khan filmChhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal, surpassed Salman Khan's much-anticipated Eid release Sikandar in occupancy, drawing more footfall even on Day 51. This surprising turn of events highlights Chhaava's ongoing success as Sikandar struggles to gain traction despite its initial hype.

Punjab teachers to display Chief Minister's pic on WhatsApp for 'Sikhya Kranti'Ahead of the launch of the 'Punjab Sikhya Kranti' campaign, all school teachers in the state have been asked to set a designated graphic featuring Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann's photo as their WhatsApp display pictures.

Robbery, sex assault, shark attacks: US's advisory for travel to The BahamasThe United States's Level 2 travel advisory for the Bahamas warned of crimes such as robbery and sexual assault, unsafe water activities including shark attacks and unregulated boating.

Leaders write to me, no one signs in Tamil: PM's dig at Stalin amid language rowPrime Minister Narendra Modi, addressing a rally in Rameshwaram, said the letters he receives from Tamil Nadu leaders don't have signatures in Tamil language.

sports.headline: Inside Siraj's IPL renaissance: India snub heartbreak, reverse swing masteryMohammed Siraj's career has been a roller-coaster ride in the past few months, with the fast bowler facing several heartbreaks. However, the speedster has arrived at the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) having learnt his lessons and is putting a show for the ages at the T20 extravaganza.

SRH coach Vettori continues to back aggressive style despite GT thrashingAfter suffering their fourth loss of the season with a defeat to Gujarat Titans, SRH head coach Daniel Vettori still backed his team's aggressive style, insisting it can succeed again with better reading of conditions moving forward.

SRH's bowling and not batting hurting them the most in IPL 2025: Ambati RayuduAmbati Rayudu feels that SRH's bowling is hurting them more this season than their batting after losing to Gujarat Titans on Sunday, April 6. Hyderabad lost their 4th game on the trot.

Watch: Washington Sundar recreates famous Gabba six against Sunrisers HyderabadGujarat Titans all-rounder Washington Sundar re-created his famous six from the Gabba Test 2021 during his match-winning innings against Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) in Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

How Mohammed Siraj used India axe for IPL rebirth: Told myself my cricket isn't overGT pacer Mohammed Siraj revealed how he used the Indian team snub as motivation for his rebirth in IPL. Siraj picked up 4 wickets against SRH on Sunday in front of his home crowd.

Mohammed Siraj joins Jasprit Bumrah in prestigious IPL list after 4/17 vs SRHMohammed Siraj joined Jasprit Bumrah in an elite list of bowlers as he picked up career-best figures of 4 for 17 during the SRH vs GT clash on Sunday, April 6. Siraj has been in sensational form since joining GT.

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

IPL 2025: Tim David credits RCB's 'pressure-free' team environment for rich formRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Tim David has credited his team's pressure-free environment for his good form in the ongoing season. David has scored back-to-back fiery knocks against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) and Gujarat Titans (GT).

Tim David on approach vs Jasprit Bumrah: 1st ball will go for four or sixRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Tim David opened up on the team's plan to counter Jasprit Bumrah in the clash against Mumbai Indians (MI) in Match 20 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Real Madrid Legends vs Barcelona Legends: Morientes, Barral hand Los Blancos winFernando Morientes and David Barral were on the score sheet as the Real Madrid legends defeated Barcelona legends in the El Clasico legends faceoff on Sunday, April 6.

LSG's Digvesh Rathi meets idol Sunil Narine, gives hilarious reason for celebrationLucknow Super Giants mystery spinner Digvesh Rathi finally got his wish as he met his idol and Kolkata Knight Riders star Sunil Narine on Sunday, April 6 at the Eden Gardens. KKR and LSG will square off on April 8.

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

IPL 2025: Tim David credits RCB's 'pressure-free' team environment for rich formRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Tim David has credited his team's pressure-free environment for his good form in the ongoing season. David has scored back-to-back fiery knocks against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) and Gujarat Titans (GT).

Tim David on approach vs Jasprit Bumrah: 1st ball will go for four or sixRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Tim David opened up on the team's plan to counter Jasprit Bumrah in the clash against Mumbai Indians (MI) in Match 20 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Real Madrid Legends vs Barcelona Legends: Morientes, Barral hand Los Blancos winFernando Morientes and David Barral were on the score sheet as the Real Madrid legends defeated Barcelona legends in the El Clasico legends faceoff on Sunday, April 6.

LSG's Digvesh Rathi meets idol Sunil Narine, gives hilarious reason for celebrationLucknow Super Giants mystery spinner Digvesh Rathi finally got his wish as he met his idol and Kolkata Knight Riders star Sunil Narine on Sunday, April 6 at the Eden Gardens. KKR and LSG will square off on April 8.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
